mapper.select: select user_no as userNo, user_name as userName, user_seq_no as userSeqNo, access_token as accessToken from user where user_no IN ( SELECT user_no FROM pay WHERE cate_id in( SELECT cate_id FROM category WHERE DATE_FORMAT(CONVERT_TZ(NOW(), 'UTC', 'Asia/Seoul'), '%c/%e') = CONCAT(SUBSTRING_INDEX(cate_date, '~', -1), '') ) )

SELECT s.cate_date FROM user u JOIN ( SELECT p.user_no, c.cate_date FROM pay p JOIN category c ON p.cate_id = c.cate_id WHERE p.cate_id = c.cate_id ) AS s ON u.user_no = s.user_no WHERE u.user_no = #{userNo};
SELECT user_no as userNo, user_name as userName, user_seq_no as userSeqNo, access_token as accessToken FROM user where access_token is not null
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user ( user_no, user_id, user_pwd, user_name, user_nickname, user_phone, user_seq_no, access_token, refresh_token ) VALUES ( #{userNo}, #{userId}, SHA2(#{userPwd}, 256), #{userName}, #{userNickname}, #{userPhone}, #{userSeqNo}, #{accessToken}, #{refreshToken} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE user_id = #{userId}, user_pwd = SHA2(#{userPwd}, 256), user_name = #{userName}, user_nickname = #{userNickname}, user_phone = #{userPhone}, access_token = #{accessToken}, refresh_token = #{refreshToken}
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE temp_user SELECT user_no FROM user WHERE user_success = 1;

INSERT INTO point (user_no, point_date, point_price) SELECT p.user_no, DATE_FORMAT(CONVERT_TZ(NOW(), '+00:00', '+09:00'), '%Y-%m-%d'), SUM(p.count * c.cate_cost) AS total_cost FROM ( SELECT p.user_no, p.cate_id, COUNT(p.cate_id) AS count FROM pay p WHERE p.user_no IN ( SELECT user_no FROM temp_user ) GROUP BY p.user_no, p.cate_id ) p JOIN category c ON c.cate_id = p.cate_id WHERE c.cate_date LIKE CONCAT('%', DATE_FORMAT(CONVERT_TZ(NOW(), '+00:00', '+09:00')), '%c/%e'), '%') GROUP BY p.user_no;
DROP TEMPORARY TABLE IF EXISTS temp_user;
